flawed_nl_solution:
28 x 2/7 = <<28*2/7=196/2>>196/2 students were absent last Monday.
So, 28 - 196/2 = <<28-196/2=-70>>-70 students were present last Monday.
#### -70

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 8, not 196/2. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
